name: Tengoku 3: 天国楓葉呪 〜 Lament of Autumn Maiden
name_original: Tengoku 3: 天国楓葉呪 〜 Lament of Autumn Maiden
description:
Fullscreen is recommended. The browser version may not run well on older devices, so a download for windows is also available. If the game loses focus, try left clicking on the window, or refreshing the page.

Check out the other Tengoku Project games here! https://itch.io/c/1985316/tengoku-project

Tengoku Fuuyouju (Maple Leaf Curse)

"I shouldn't cause problems like this to make my own desires come true..."

When winter arrives, Fuuka is going to disappear. But when her childhood friend Shirokuro devises a plan to cause an eternal autumn, Angelica, Cornelia and Yuki are forced to investigate and stop their plans in time for the winter festival. 

Controls Move / Navigate menus [Arrow Keys] / [WASD] / (D-pad) Shoot / Confirm (in menus) [Z] / [J] / (A) Bomb / Back (in menus) [X] / [K] / (X) Slow Movement [Shift] / (Left Trigger) Pause [Space] / (Menu Button) Toggle Fullscreen Alt + Enter Hints
  • Collect cursed leaves from enemies to increase your power and enter Curse Mode
  • When in Curse Mode, the bar drains slower if you aren't shooting
  • Your score is multiplied while in Curse Mode
  • If you collect extra cursed leaves while you already have 3 active, it will spawn regular leaves to collect
